title: F/S - PSA Graded T206 Name on Top - including McGraw Tolstoi
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: F/S - PSA Graded T206 Name on Top - including McGraw Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
Changing focus yet again... here are my three PSA graded name on top cards.  Backs are clean and I can provide scans if necessary.  I prefer to sell as a lot at $225 delivered, but I will list prices individually as well.  Paypal gift preferred, check/mo is fine as well.

Bill Sweeney (Boston) - Piedmont 350 - PSA4 MC - $50
Jimmy Williams - Piedmont 150 - PSA4 MC - $60
John McGraw (Glove at Hip) - Tolstoi - PSA2 MC - $130

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/miscutPsa/web.jpg[/IMG]

Scans of name on top are a little blurry:
